solution_line_template: The block has {servings_per_block} servings and he has eaten {servings_eaten} servings leaving {servings_per_block}-{servings_eaten} = <<{servings_per_block}-{servings_eaten}={remaining_servings}>>{remaining_servings} servings of cheese

There are {remaining_servings} servings of cheese left and each serving is {calories_per_serving} calories for a total of {remaining_servings}*{calories_per_serving} = <<{remaining_servings}*{calories_per_serving}={remaining_calories}>>{remaining_calories} calories
